response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value of your business. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you is $10,000. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $9,500, a price that reflects its true value while ensuring a fair deal for both parties. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 9500}
